title: Terms Of Service Update: Why do you want to go to war with your player base Riot?
body:
Reading Section 6 in the updated "Terms of Service" made me feel sick to my stomach.

The length to which Riot went to denigrate people outside of the organization who just want to see this game improved is quite frankly sad.

Not much else to say.  Read Section 6 if you are looking for another reason to give up on this game.

Peace
